input.description: adapter name [Optional] The name of the adapter that is enabled on the Peer. The default adapter name is HPSEActor

1. Lists the storage systems the management server detects. Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>storagesystem</category> <process-id>find-storage-system-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <all/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. all[Required] Indicates that details of all storage systems are required.
2. Provides the name of the storage system specified. Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>storagesystem</category> <process-id>find-storage-system-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <storage-system-id>1001</storage-system-id> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. storage-system-id[Required] Storage System identifier.
3. Lists the subcomponents of the specified storage system. Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>storagesystem</category> <process-id>find-storage-system-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <storage-system-id>1001</storage-system-id> <all/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. storage-system-id[Required] Storage System identifier. all[Required] Indicates that all the details of specified storage system are required.
4. Lists the ports for the storage system specified. Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>storagesystem</category> <process-id>find-storage-system-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <storage-system-id>1001</storage-system-id> <port/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. storage-system-id[Required] Storage System identifier. port[Required] Indicates that all the port details of specified storage system are required.
5. Lists the LUNs for the storage system specified. Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>storagesystem</category> <process-id>find-storage-system-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <storage-system-id>1001</storage-system-id> <lun/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. storage-system-id[Required] Storage System identifier. lun[Required] Indicates that all the LUNs of specified storage system are required.
6. Lists the storage pools for the storage system specified. Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>storagesystem</category> <process-id>find-storage-system-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <storage-system-id>1001</storage-system-id> <pool/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. storage-system-id[Required] Storage System identifier. pool[Required] Indicates that all the storage pools of specified storage system are required.
7. Lists the volumes for the storage system specified. Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>storagesystem</category> <process-id>find-storage-system-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <storage-system-id>1001</storage-system-id> <volume/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. storage-system-id[Required] Storage System identifier. volume[Required] Indicates that all the volumes of specified storage system are required.
8. Lists the storage capabilities for the storage system specified. Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>storagesystem</category> <process-id>find-storage-system-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <storage-system-id>1001</storage-system-id> <storagecapability/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. storage-system-id[Required] Storage System identifier. storagecapability[Required] Indicates that all the storagecapabilities of specified storage system are required.
9. Lists the drives for the storage system specified. Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>storagesystem</category> <process-id>find-storage-system-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <storage-system-id>1001</storage-system-id> <drive/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. storage-system-id[Required] Storage System identifier. drive[Required] Indicates that all the drives of specified storage system are required.
10. Lists the extents for the storage system specified. Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>storagesystem</category> <process-id>find-storage-system-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <storage-system-id>1001</storage-system-id> <extent/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. storage-system-id[Required] Storage System identifier. extent[Required] Indicates that all the extents of specified storage system are required.
11. Provides the host security group for the storage system specified. Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>storagesystem</category> <process-id>find-storage-system-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <storage-system-id>1001</storage-system-id> <hostsecuritygroup/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. storage-system-id[Required] Storage System identifier. hostsecuritygroup[Required] Indicates that all the hostsecuritygroups of specified storage system are required.
12. Lists the masking capabilities for the storage system specified. Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>storagesystem</category> <process-id>find-storage-system-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <storage-system-id>1001</storage-system-id> <maskingcapabilities/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. storage-system-id[Required] Storage System identifier. maskingcapabilities[Required] Indicates that all the maskingcapabilities of specified storage system are required.
13. Lists the unmapped volumes for the storage system specified. Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>storagesystem</category> <process-id>find-storage-system-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <storage-system-id>1001</storage-system-id> <unmappedvolume/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. storage-system-id[Required] Storage System identifier. unmappedvolume[Required] Indicates that all the unmappedvolumes of specified storage system are required.
14. Lists the mapped volumes for the storage system specified. Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>storagesystem</category> <process-id>find-storage-system-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <storage-system-id>1001</storage-system-id> <mappedvolume/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. storage-system-id[Required] Storage System identifier. mappedvolume[Required] Indicates that all the mappedvolumes of specified storage system are required.
15. Lists the storage client settings for the storage system specified. Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>storagesystem</category> <process-id>find-storage-system-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <storage-system-id>1001</storage-system-id> <storageclientsettings/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. storage-system-id[Required] Storage System identifier. storageclientsettings[Required] Indicates that all the storageclientsettings of specified storage system are required.
16. Provides a detailed description of the storage systems the management server detects. Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>storagesystem</category> <process-id>find-storage-system-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <all/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. all[Required] Indicates that details of all storage systems are required.
17. Provides a detailed description of the storage system specified. Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>storagesystem</category> <process-id>find-storage-system-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <storage-system-id>1001</storage-system-id> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. storage-system-id[Required] Storage System identifier.
18. Provides a detailed description of the subcomponents of the specified storage system. Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>storagesystem</category> <process-id>find-storage-system-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <storage-system-id>1001</storage-system-id> <all/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. storage-system-id[Required] Storage System identifier. all[Required] Indicates that all the details of specified storage system are required.
19. Provides a detailed description of the ports for the storage system specified. Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>storagesystem</category> <process-id>find-storage-system-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <storage-system-id>1001</storage-system-id> <port/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. storage-system-id[Required] Storage System identifier. port[Required] Indicates that all the port details of specified storage system are required.
20. Provides a detailed description of the LUNs for the storage system specified. Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>storagesystem</category> <process-id>find-storage-system-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <storage-system-id>1001</storage-system-id> <lun/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. storage-system-id[Required] Storage System identifier. lun[Required] Indicates that all the LUNs of specified storage system are required.
21. Provides a detailed description of the storage pools for the storage system specified. Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>storagesystem</category> <process-id>find-storage-system-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <storage-system-id>1001</storage-system-id> <pool/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. storage-system-id[Required] Storage System identifier. pool[Required] Indicates that all the storage pools of specified storage system are required.

<items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>storagesystem</category> <process-id>find-storage-system-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <storage-system-id>1001</storage-system-id> <volume/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. storage-system-id[Required] Storage System identifier. volume[Required] Indicates that all the volumes of specified storage system are required.

<items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>storagesystem</category> <process-id>find-storage-system-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <storage-system-id>1001</storage-system-id> <storagecapability/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>

command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. storage-system-id[Required] Storage System identifier. storagecapability[Required] Indicates that all the storagecapabilities of specified storage system are required.

<items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>storagesystem</category> <process-id>find-storage-system-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <storage-system-id>1001</storage-system-id> <unmappedvolume/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>

<items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>storagesystem</category> <process-id>find-storage-system-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <storage-system-id>1001</storage-system-id> <mappedvolume/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>

30. Provides a detailed description of the storage client settings for the storage system specified. Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>storagesystem</category> <process-id>find-storage-system-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <storage-system-id>1001</storage-system-id> <storageclientsettings/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>

documentation.description:
This wrapper supports the following requirements:-
1. Lists the storage systems the management server detects. 2. Provides the name of the storage system specified. 3. Lists the subcomponents of the specified storage system. 4. Lists the ports for the storage system specified. 5. Lists the LUNs for the storage system specified. 6. Lists the storage pools for the storage system specified. 7. Lists the volumes for the storage system specified. 8. Lists the storage capabilities for the storage system specified. 9. Lists the drives for the storage system specified. 10. Lists the extents for the storage system specified. 11. Provides the host security group for the storage system specified. 12. Lists the masking capabilities for the storage system specified. 13. Lists the unmapped volumes for the storage system specified. 14. Lists the mapped volumes for the storage system specified. 15. Lists the storage client settings for the storage system specified. 16. Sets the custom name of the specified storage system. 17. Provides a detailed description of the storage systems detected by the management server. 18. Provides a detailed description of the specified storage system, such as the controller port identifiers for the storage system specified, not the actual ports. 19. Provides a detailed description of the ports for the storage system specified. 20. Provides a detailed description of the LUNs for the storage system specified. 21. Provides a detailed description of the storage pools for the storage system specified. 22. Provides a detailed description of the volumes for the storage system specified. 23. Provides a detailed description of the unmapped volumes for the storage system specified. 24. Provides a detailed description of the mapped volumes for the storage system specified. 25. Provides a detailed description of the storage pool capability for the storage system specified. 26. Provides a detailed description of the drives for the storage system specified. 27. Provides a detailed description of the extents for the storage system specified. 28. Provides a detailed description of the host security group for the storage system specified. 29. Provides a detailed description of the masking capabilities for the storage system specified. 30. Provides a detailed description of the storage client settings for the storage system specified.
